title: Women in Tech Leadership Workshop
description: Learn strategies for career advancement and professional development specifically designed for women in technology roles

title: She Leads - Mentorship Program Kickoff
description: Join our inclusive mentorship program designed to connect women professionals with industry leaders in technology and business

title: Women Entrepreneurs Networking Event
description: Expand your professional network with women entrepreneurs, investors, and industry leaders focused on supporting women-led businesses

title: Women in STEM Conference
description: Annual conference highlighting achievements and opportunities for women in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics fields
organizer: Department of Science & Technology, Government of India
source: Department of Science & Technology Official Portal

title: Rural Women Digital Literacy Program
description: Initiative to train women from rural areas in digital literacy skills to enhance employment opportunities

title: Women's Financial Independence Workshop
description: Workshop focused on financial literacy, investment strategies, and economic independence for women professionals

title: Women in Leadership Summit
description: Summit bringing together women leaders from various industries to share experiences and strategies for breaking the glass ceiling

title: Tech Skills for Women Returnees
description: Specialized program to help women returning to the workforce after a career break update their technical skills
